summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3839 for the improvement of North 61st Street, from Aurora Avenue to Phinney Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47128, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
